content.detailedDescription:
This event happened to my brother and several of my friends. it was also observed by a neighbour who lived across the street from my friend.I was just told about it last night.

sometime in 2004 (i was not given an exact date), my brother and friends were sitting around hanging out in the evening. my brother and one friend were sitting with their backs toward the window, and the other friend (who was the tenant in this apartment) was across from them, facing the window. 

according to their description, a bright orange light appeared outside the window and was sort of bobbing around. the light was described as being "about the size of a football". it did this for a minute or two and then flew away very fast, on an angle. it was heading roughly east, and ascending as it went. 

my brother and the 2 friends went outside to see if anyone else saw it and a man who lived across the street said that he had seen it hovering outside my friend's building as well.
content.summary: Football-shaped orange orb floating erratically outside window.

content.detailedDescription: My cousin & wife were visiting from dallas.  they were laying by the pool in the afternoon when they witnessed this.  they have photos...But, objects are very far away. i have seen the photos.  they both saw them and said that they appeared there for a long period of time.  if/when you get back to me...I will connect you to my cousin and have him send you the photos. they are digital.
content.summary: Several objects together appearing to hover over the port of los angeles.

content.detailedDescription: There was eight of us friends sitting out on the sidewalk in our neighborhood.  we usually spend a great part of the evenings sitting back and looking at the stars and watching for satellites.  at around 10:30 pm, a disc like object with a blue light in the center of the objects bottom side passed over.  the blue light was brilliant like that of a blue l.E.D.  the bottom of the object had a feint glow on it from the blue light.  the object moved a high rate of speed in comparison to all the aircraft we normally see pass over...Around 2x to 3x the speed of the average jet liner.  the object was still visible after approximately 1-2 miles away after it had passed over.  we were charged with excitement and while discussing what we had seen, someone noticed another one on the same path, this one was different, more blueish green in color and moving the same speed.  to describe this object i would say that it looked like a long string of glow sticks, imagine this string of glow sticks being on something like a bungee, whipping in a circular motion from front to back and then back to front in the direction that it was traveling.  this one was much more shocking to witness than the first...Then in about the same amount of time that it took for the first one to go out of sight and the second to become visible, the third came into view.  the third was very similar to the first, same speed, same blue light and flying flat and straight...Now i did forget to mention before, there was absolutely no sound what-so-ever.  with each pass we expected to hear the sounds of a jet engine, but nothing at all.  the silence was especially surprising, considering the speed at which the objects were moving.  there was a very slight breeze in the opposite directing that the objects were moving.  one of the gals in the group went inside here home and looked on the net to see if anyone else had reported anything and found that something that matched our description had been spotted the night before in another state and again in the previous month in new york.
content.summary: 3 separate objects with non-blinking blue/bluegreen lights all on the exact same flight path.

content.detailedDescription: For approximately 1 week there has been an extremely bright to the west of my home. i first noticed it while driving home from the town of maricopa. it is bright enough to look like a large airliner flying toward you. my wife and i argued about it as that's what i thought it was, but then i realized that she was correct and that it wasn't moving. the light appears much larger than any other star in the sky. the light does not move and then without warning just suddenly blinks out. it then comes back two, or three times, within four to five minutes, before going out all together. i have never believed in the whole "little green men" thing, however i am at a total loss for an explanation. my entire family observed the strange sight last night. as previously stated this has been happening for approximately one week. also, i should say that i live out in the desert and my nearest neighbor is about 1/4 of a mile from my home, so there are very few lights to interfere with observing the night sky. my family and i have lived at this location for more than a year and had never observed this light prior to a week before.
content.summary: Extremely bright stationary light, then fades in and out.

content.detailedDescription:
I work near the clearwater/st. pete airport. 

i was on the phone talking to my wife. from the south i saw an object in the air. i work near the airport and to see something in the air is not unusual. 

it was the speed that first caught my attention. next what caught my attention is that it was a sphere shape. sometimes you might see one of those mylar balloons in the air. they waver and change shape as they rotate. what i saw had a steady flight path and it did not change shape. 

it was high, just below the thunder clouds that were developing that day. i would estimate that it was traveling at about three times faster than most common aircraft i see in the area. 

it was dark colored and did not emanate any light. 

i said something about it to my wife on the phone. by the time i could comprehend what i was looking at it was gone. i had a camera on my phone but did not photograph it.

i believe that i watched it for two minutes, from a pinpoint to an obvious shape flying by. i lost sight of it as it passed behind the building where i work.
content.summary: Sphere shaped object moving at a rapid rate over tampa bay.

content.detailedDescription: Relaxing on our back patio "bird watching" with my wife, in the later part of july. the evening was very clear (low humidity), the sky was very blue in color and the clouds were white; perfect for bird watching. we were useing our binoculars (7x35mm, 367ft at 1000yrds). suddenly, my wife asked for me to look at an object in the sky, useing the bins. she believed it to be a large bird, after i had observed the object for about 2 minutes i handed the bins. to her. after she watched the object for about 2 min., she handed back the bins., saying that she couldn't accept what she saw and went back into the house. to this day she will not talk about the incident. the object was black, but the material make-up had a differant texture than our aircraft, but the color was simular to our (us) stealth bombers; the shape was that of a pyramid and it turned slowly (clockwise), my left to right. as, i resumed watching the pyramid (in total amazement), the object began to drift in an odd patern; moving downward and to my right or to its left. after about 10 to 15 minutes of observation, the object suddenly was gone. i immediatly thought of star trek or the sg1 series (star gate). it was really neat. i didn't feel threatened or ill at ease at the time, nor do i now. but, i only wish that we, as a race, could use our energies for the good of humanity; therefor, evolving to that form which would allow our species to one day travel into the cosmos. if i feel anything at all from this experiance, i would have to say "envy".
content.summary: Observed a ufo in july of 2009

content.detailedDescription:
One evening at about dusk in sept of 1981 (i'm not sure of the day) i was riding around in my boyfriend's truck. we had graduated the previous year from high school.
he had picked me up and as we were driving around deciding what to do for the evening he spotted a shiny disc like shape in the sky which appeared to be reflecting off the last rays of the setting sun, and pointed it out to me. it was just hovering in the sky about 10-15 stories high, over a field next to the grade school i attended when i was a child. we drove closer to get a better look and suddenly it shot off to our right; faster than we had ever seen anything move before. we immediately began trying to follow it and did succeed in following it to another open area by a shopping center. it seemed like it knew we were following it because it would slow down at times and we would "catch up" with it. this time it was closer to the ground and even though the sky had become darker, we got a better look at it. it was dark gray in color and shaped like a rounded chevron at times and at other angles it appeared to be a rounded triangle. we were trying to figure out if it could be an aircraft that was being tested by someone at ft knox, but after watching it move and hover a while vertically and horizontally we began to consider that it might be a ufo. after watching it for a few minutes, i began to feel very eery, like i was being watched and that someone or something was trying to assess what i was thinking. we rolled down the windows to see if we could hear anything but it seemed to emit no sound, the hairs on my arm began to stand up and i began to be fearful and began to quietly pray. as i prayed "god please watch over us and keep us safe" the object moved vertically and then sped off horizontally in a southward direction from louisville. immediately thereafter we saw three military jets fly over in formation in the direction of the object. i have never forgotten this incident and i never spoke with my boyfriend about it again. in fact he seemed so skittish about it that once it flew away he began talking about other things as if it never happened.
i have only told this story to about 3 people as i didn't want someone to think i was nuts.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: It was gray and seemed disc like but also took the shape of a rounded chevron or rounded triangle at different angles.

content.detailedDescription:
At a little after 10, i noticed a very loud rumbling.  i thought nothing of it, as i live next to a train tracks.  there was a vibration in the house.  and it lasted for about 20-30 seconds.  half an hour later, i checked my voicemail on my phone and there were two messages from my brother who lives 2 blocks away.  he told me he heard the same rumbling and ran outside to see what it was.  you see, there was no whistle, and had it been a train, there would have been a whistle, and that had just not occurred to me.  he ran outside to see what it was and noticed a fireball flying approximately 40,000 feet up (admittedly, a guess) flying from zenith to horizon in 10 seconds.  at that height, that seems too slow to be a meteor, but too fast to be a commercial airline.  upon explanation of this story to my wife, at about the same time 30 miles to the south in high point, nc, she noticed the same rumbling.  the object was flying south to north at an incredible rate of speed.  it was all the talk at the local watering hole the next morning with no explanation.  no mention was made of it on the local news.

i'm looking for anyone with photographic evidence.
content.summary: Loud rumbling progressing across the sky.  loud as a train, but flying.

content.detailedDescription:
I get called to the window of my apartment flat by my girlfriend and i see this bright sphere maybe 3-4 times brighter and larger than the brightest star in the sky. there was an overcast of clouds at the time so that's the first thing that caught my eye. at first i thought it was a meteor but it had a straight path (aproximately north to south). it was glowing a darker shade of yellow , as if it was on fire or something like it. it took about 1 minute to pass the entire sky shortly after it vanished glowing less and less. aprox. 5 minutes after another exactly similar object crosses the sky in the exact same pattern and the exact same time. i managed to film the first and i'll try to upload it , i'm not jumping to any conlcusions i have no ideea what it might be , my guess was a missile but it could be anything. i shall check this sight regularly and if needed i shall contact you again. for now i'll just remain anonimous. 

*note : i have no ideea if this light i was seeing was above or under the clouds , or who knows maybe even in the clouds. 

i'm mostly just curios if anybody else saw these. the movie is in mp4 
format, filmed by my nokia n95 phone. 

cheers.
content.summary: 2 spheres passing the night sky, maybe 5 minutes apart.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 5am and i was trying to get back to sleep...Three friends and i were camping...They had just come into the tent. i had my ipod on low but noticed some commotion with my friends and wondered what was going on. just as soon as i was turning over i immediately saw a very beautiful bright glowing white light moving across the sky...Much, much bigger than a star but the same kind of color. it seemed to be very close...Just over the trees above the tent. we had time to call to a few others outside to check this amazing sight out. it was mostly steady but changed pace maybe a couple of times.
it was in sight for about 5 minutes and as it went over the trees the light from it was still so bright...I couldn't keep my eyes off it until it was completely gone. 
our reactions varied but were similar...I didn't know what to think it was when i first saw it...I just knew it was beautiful. one friend was trying hard to come up with logical explanations of what it could be (besides a ufo), but there was no mistaking it for anything ordinary. even he was stumped, and there was no resisting the fact that we had just witnessed something very wonderful and extraordinary!
my feelings were very clear...I felt calm and peaceful, as well as happy and excited, when it was there. i didn't want it to leave! i was drawn to it.

location: willow creek, california. humboldt county.
content.summary: Amazing and beautiful bright light moving slowly across the sky. very close.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to smoke @ approx.00:35 hrs. 08/08/2010 and immediately noticed a fairly bright light in the e-ese sky at approx.40*-50* azimuth (by estimation...Could possibly be slightly higher azimuth,but has been changing to some degree, with movement) and it caught my attention because of it's unusual movements. went inside to get my wife whom also observed this for awhile until she felt it time to return indoors. long story short, whatever this thing is, it moves in ways that no known aircraft possibly could, and is completely silent. doesn't seem to truly reflect movements of a balloon,yet cannot say for certain just what it (the source of the light) is, and thought it best to make notification to you in case other folks in this area might also have sighted this as well, or perhaps someone can explain it. observed from 00:35 to 01:00 and decided to come inside to make notification. am going to check now (01:19) to see if still in same general location in sky or not. ***still visible now at 01:20 but slightly higher azimuth (55-60*) and slightly more southerly than previous. motions are variable and sometimes slighlty rapid and jerky. am going out now to further observe. very interesting and compelling to watch! unfortunately we don't own any video equipment,and only cheap 110/35mm cameras,but hopefully someone else in our area whom has proper equipment will notice it and get some footage or stills of this strange light. anyways,it's exciting to watch so i'm going back out to observe it more. approximate compass position would be (estimated) 110-140* (ese) and last azimuth as reported approx.55*-60*+.
content.summary: Strange bright(moving) light in eastern sky @ approx.40-50* azimuth.

content.detailedDescription:
Small, star like flying north in clear sky, at exactly 9:31 pm  

at 9:49 pm small, star like ufo flying in clear sky, east erratically in the night sky.
content.summary: 2 small, star like ufos.

content.detailedDescription:
I don't speak english, i write in spanish. this is my story of the event:

cuando ten���a 8 a���os, viv���a con mi familia en un municpio del lado oeste de la capital de venezuela llamado catia. una noche me asom��� por la ventana de la cocina del apartamento donde viv���amos y de lejos logro observar una nave iluminada que ven���a volando cada vez m���s cerca hacia mi ubicaci���n. la nave era redonda, casi como una esfera, y ten���a luces circulares de diferentes colores, similares a las de un sem���foro, a los lados a nivel de la mitad de la nave. el vuelo de la misma era muy particular, giraba en el cielo como un trompo luminoso, era aluscinante verla, y yo siendo un ni���o me llam��� tanto la atenci���n que r���pidamente llame a mi madre para que observara el increible suceso. mientras mi madre que estaba en la cocina conmigo se acercaba a la ventana para ver qu��� era lo que quer���a mostrarle, nunca perdi de vista la nave. la vi de tan cerca que casi cre��� que se iba a estacionar en la azotea del edificio, mi madre logr��� ver los ���ltimos destellos de la nave antes de que ambos la perdieramos totalmente de vista, y en ese momento le describ��� como era verdaderamente el ovni y me dijo- "seguramente era un avi���n sobre volando la ciudad de noche"- y yo muy seguro de mi mismo le dije a mi madre- no existen aviones redondos ni que giren como un trompo con luces de diferentes colores mam���- .Esa imagen, ese momento tan increible de mi vida jam���s lo olvidar���, aunque la gente no me crea, yo estoy seguro que lo viv���, que no fue un sue���o, y hoy a mis casi 24 a���os de existencia desde hace tiempo quer���a hacerle saber esto a alguna organizaci���n que se dedique al estudio de la existencia de los ovnis porque yo si creo que existan, no fue ninguna jugada de mi imaginaci���n de ni���o. soy un hombre totalmente sano f���sica y psicol���gicamente. s���lo he compartido esto con mi familia y mi novia, y ahora con ustedes, obviamente nada me ha cre���do hasta ahora, espero que ustedes si lo hagan. mi deseo no es que alg���n d���a vuelva a ver evidencia directa de que los ovnis existen, mi deseo es compartir mi relato a personas que me crean y formar parte de los miles de seres humanos que hemos tenido un encuentro cercano (o lejano) con vida extraterrestre. espero que les llegue este texto y disculpen que no pude escribirlo en ingl���s. les aseguro que esta historia es 10000% real. no soy ning���n vago que le gusta fastidiar en internet, soy todo un profesional cabeza de familia que quiere compartir un secreto que he llevado por 15 a���os, lamentablemente la ���nica evidencia que poseo del hecho es mi recuerdo. gracias de antemano a todos los que logren leer mi historia...
content.summary: Object with circular form and with different lights of 4 colors in the middle of sphere spin in the sky at night.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my balcony in my 4th story apt. i noticed a bright seemingly distant object that seemed to be high in the sky west of me. i used a building that was 3 blocks north west of my position as a point of reference. i thought the object was a star or planet at first because it was stationary, but it sparked my interest because it was pulsating with red blue and white lights like that of an airplane in the night sky, except that instead of flashes the lights seemed to revolving like a lighthouse beacon. i kind of made a mental note of this objects position and drew an imaginary line from the object that was at a very high altitude and the building underneath it. i went to call my wife so that she could come and take a look at it. we watched it together for about 30 minutes and my wife who was standing to my right said that it seemed to move right slightly. it didnt seem that way to me.
then after 30 minutes my wife went back inside and i decided to stay and continue watching. i had been standing this whole time and decided to sit down on the floor of the balcony. i had watched for about 2 minutes and then it seemed to move slightly right, so i stood and noticed that the object was indeed moving right and dropping altitude very slowly until it seemed parallel to the top point of the building's north side. it hovered there for about 2 minutes then disappeared out of sight. i called my wife back out to show her that it was definitely not a star or planet because of how rapidly it moved after being perfectly stationary for such along time. she was shocked because we had kind of assumed it was a star until it disappeared in the clear night sky.  we tried to reason that it was helicopter but the object seemed to hovering at 50000 feet because it looked much higher then the airplanes that are visible at 35-38000 feet. im not familiar with all types of air craft but i had heard that helicopters dont really fly at super high altitudes. then we thought it was a hot air balloon with lights, but then we dismissed that because of how perfectly still it was for half an hour, beside the fact that somebody up there would need an oxygen tank for breathing at that altitude. at this point we were out of ideas and my wife went back inside. i stayed outside a while longer and scanned the sky hoping to see it pop up again but it didnt at which point i decided to look in the eastern direction. i then noticed the flashing blue light of an airplane and watched for a few seconds as it moved slowly across the sky. my view was perpendicular to its path. after watching it for a minute i saw an object that moved at an incredible speed east of my position but also gaining altitude as it crossed the path of the air plane which was flying south east at a lower altitude. it was a thick streak of bright powder blue that narrowed at the point furthest from me. it lasted a fraction of a second, at which point i got freaked out and went inside. because of its color i tried to argue to myself that it could have been lightning but i have never seen horizontal powder blue triangular shaped lightning on a clear night.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Stationary object about the size of star as it appears in the sky but with very pronounced color changes and and flash expansions like that of a multi colored beacon, then began to start moving north west after 35 minutes of hovering and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I have been watching the website 

*link moved to additional evidence section below--sgonzalez/cms.

and read one and wrote one report re ufos there.

i have deduced that the shapes in the air may be reflections--they seem to multiply when there are more cars parked in the area.  it is well lit, to say the least.  i think cars are parked below the camera, and they reflect light up into the lens.  this also accounts for movement of the shapes.

the glowing disklike crafts that pass right to left in the dark are still a mystery, however.  watch 4:30 a m to 4:50 or so.
content.summary: Santa cesarea, italy -- some deductions.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were traveling in co hwy 41  towards leeds to take some people home after the public fireworks show at the oak mountian amp.Theater.Its a large show with 2 other locations doing the same thing at the same to a radio broadcast. it was ling after the show around 10:30pm when i decided to ask my friend if its ok to smoke a cig in his car.As i crack the window i notice in the front right of the windshield that there's an orange glowing object above the mountian and as i look at my friend i tell him hay check it out.He looks at me and says oh thats just the reflection of your cig in the windshield and then i proceed to throw my cig out and tell him to look now.In amazement he decides to pull over and we get out of the car and watch as this thing as best as i can describe begins to acsend and decend and also move from right to left 200 to 300 feet above the mountian pulsating. then it begins to change shapes from teardrop to oval to well as i can best describe it looked like the oil in a lava lamp.Almost like it was on fire but not.Like it was splitting and reconnecting back together glowing the same color as a sunset. to say the least it was breathtaking.So as o try to come to terms with what happened "come out of shock" the object begins to ascend to about 500 feet and then vanashes.But like it was in slow motion in the same spot in the sky and faded like when a candle burns itself out.It seems like it took forever.So we take our friends to the meeting place to drop them off and then we head back towards hwy 280 when my friend notices before me that that object is on the other side of the county road in a field doing the same lava lamp thing it was before but just above groung level maybe 15feet from the ground and as he tries to pull over it dissappears but not like before it was quick like snap of a finger gone.When we got to my parents home in indian springs (about 10 or 12 miles away)and began to tell my mother and father what had happened.And in doing so my mother had mentioned she had seen something in the 60's in the sky here that made the news but it was reported to be a weather baloon over birmingham.She had given a very similar discription of what she saw so i was wondering if anybody in this area saw the same thing.Or maybe someone has seen the same thing or has footage or photos of the object that would help me prove me and my friend are not crazy!!!!Thanx for reading
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.shape: Fireball,   Oval,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Lava lamp in the sky on the fourth of july, 1997.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting out on the beachfront back porch of our rental cottage. it was a full moon, there was some haze around the moon but other than that a perfectly clear night. it was ten p.M. when all of the sudden a 'classic' saucer shaped object appeared to the right of the moon with reddish lights, it 'came on' and stayed for about 15 seconds then as if someone had turned off a light it went off. we all shouted, 'what was that'? there were no planes, boats, helicopters or people in the air or on the beach. we watched the sky and about 15 minutes later something else appeared further north, this looked triangular in shape with colored lights and just like the first ufo, this one came on and within a few seconds looked like someone had turned off a light, it was gone. we all shouted 'there it is'! we watched the sky for two hours more and nothing else appeared, no planes, helicopters ships were in sight. we did not get a response when we emailed the local police. this is still an unknown.
content.summary: Red lights disc.

content.detailedDescription: 3 ufo over bassersdorf - dietlikon! 3 level formation. top ufo still standing at place, midle one starts to move from east to north, lowest moves quick to north.
content.summary: 3 ufo over bassersdorf - dietlikon

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving with my dog from denver to my cabin in northern wisconsin, heading eastbound on interstate 80 at approximately 3:30 pm on june, 26, 2009. i had just passed a large storm cell and photographed a possible funnel cloud 30 minutes earlier. it was sunny at the time and i recall seeing a flash that caught my eye. i looked to the left and saw an unmistakable, large, "classic" flying saucer with a small dome on top, hovering stationary just above a white grain silo about a half to a 1 mile north of i80. the silo & saucer were visible from both directions. the area between the freeway and the silo was flat with grass. i first thought this was exactly like the 50���s sci-fi movie discs (life imitating art?). however, i was struck by the size and the metallic finish. it was about twice the size of the silo, larger than i would have guessed and while silver; it had what appeared to be brushed nickel finish-unlike chrome, yet highly reflective. i have never seen metal like that before.

i considered calling 911 at the time, but i could not pinpoint my location, i couldn���t find a mile marker or any signs or exits for a long distance. i was east of north platte, nb and i think i was west of kearney, but can���t be certain. i am sure i was west of grand island. as soon as i spotted it, i changed lanes & grabbed my camera. but just as i was focusing to shoot, the saucer, which had been hovering stationary, slowly landed behind the silo, dropping out of sight. the timing was such that i wondered if it knew i was trying to photograph it. i then checked my watch and rechecked it for hours after to make sure i didn���t ���miss time���. i also didn���t see any planes or helicopters in the area. even if i could have exited the freeway, i would never have followed it as i did not want to be abducted. 

other people had to have seen it, because the traffic was fairly heavy in both directions. the disc hovered close to the ground in broad daylight. while my encounter was brief, less than a minute, i don���t know for how long it had been visible prior to my noticing it. i would really like to know if anyone else reported it, if any cattle mutilations were reported in the vicinity and if the incident was ever investigated.
content.summary: Large classic flying saucer with a dome on top, highly reflective brushed silver finish.

content.detailedDescription: I awoke when i heard a car drive by, and its headlights flash, at 3 a.M. this was rather extraordinary in our sleepy little condo complex, so i got out of bed to check that nothing suspicious was going on (my bedroom window faces our street). i saw two cars, hood to hood, and then they backed up and drove away. one of the cars finally came around and someone got out, down the street. meanwhile, something caught my attention in the night-sky - westerly, i believe. it was a very large bank of 4 rows (approximately) of bright white lights (sort of a square shape). this bank of lights was sitting above the horizon, and it did not move (i glanced at it for a few seconds, because i thought - well, maybe that's a ufo. and if not, a very large light to keep planes from flying into it). when the light rows object didn't move, i got back into bed, and went to sleep. basically, very tired, because it was so late.  but i have never seen any lights like these, in that location in the 6 years i have lived here. and i am often gazing at the moon from this window.
content.summary: Bank of bright white lights - 3 or 4 stories in height.

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in bed when i heard a loud humming noise from outside my window. i got out off bed and opened the blinds to look outside. i then noticed a bright glowing triangular shaped object low in sky above my neighbor's house. it was stationary and glowing very brightly. i quickly ran outside for a better look but the object had disappeared and there was no humming noise.
content.summary: Glowing purple and green triangle.

content.detailedDescription:
First - i saw a very pure bright white light in the west sky fly out low out of nowhere at a very high speed and then it just disappeared. it flew in a very short concentrated semi circular angle.

i did not think that much about it at the time and went about my business. i then went outside after going in and out of the house and sat down on the patio. i then to my left see something black right over the driveway. i look and see nothing. at the time i thought it was just a bird in flight that caught my eye and it is now gone. then again something black pops up in the to the left of me and it looks black and round. it is low a couple hundred feet over the wires. it then disappears as i get up and look around the area front and back. i see nothing. again - i sit down and see nothing - just enjoying the evening. then to my surprise i then agian see this black round object hovering in the same spot as earlier. this time it just hovers in one spot as i stand up to look - it just hovers. then this object starts to move very slowly - like it was taking its time. i stood there and watched as it went higher and higher very slowly. this object then as it moved up it just dissappered. i thought ok what the heck. i walked around and looked around and saw nothing. then the object appears again and it is 10 times the size it was when i first saw it. this time it is slowly moving in a straight line and it is next to a wisp of a small cloud. the wisp of the small clould moves and reveals and large gold disc. it was completely flat. so now there is a large black sphere and large gold disc sitting in the sky next to eachother. i was in awe. then as i looked the wisp of the cloud then moved and revealed another small black sphere.  the objects did not move. then they disappered and appeared in the same spot. then i saw the smaller sphere start moving.

when this happened i was looking up and from over my right shoulder i caught what looks like a flock of birds. they objects were wvey low and looked huge. they were what i can only describe as a hostess fruit pie or empanada. folded over circle with seams. these objects hovered in place and then started moving into a contolled foramtion. as this went on they got smaller and smaller as they hung around in the sky. slowing dissolving one by one.
content.summary: White light - orbs - disc.

content.detailedDescription: I first saw one bright yellow light moving to the east and making no sound. i didn't really think nothing of it. it left and out of no where another light comes out. basically out of no where. and then a third light comes and i realized that a airplanes that fast should be flying so close together.
content.summary: 3 bright lights

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend at the time and i had seen a orange/red orb. we had decided to take a walk that night as it was a cool and clear night. for some weird reason, we had no forms of technology on us at the time. it was weird for her to ever be without her cell phone. we walked down to the the river front near her house and what surprised us was an orange/red orb floating over the river about 200 yards from us. it looked like the sun. we watched it go from about the size of a large beach ball to what i would say was roughly 10 ft across. completely silent. it is possible that it was moving closer and farther away from us, but at the time i swear we both agreed that it was stationary. the object was hovering very close to the water. after about 20 minutes of watching this object shrink and grow in size, we became less interested and went back to get binoculars and a camera. when we returned, the object was gone. i have been a private pilot for 10 years and have a pretty good idea of what belongs in the sky and this was nothing i had ever seen before.
content.summary: Red/orange ufo orb hovering over calosahatchee river.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on a 2nd floor deck on the beach in ocean city, new jersey. it was dark and partly cloudy. i was watching and listening to the waves, when i noticed a circle of dim light on the beach a little to the left from directly in front of me. i was puzzled as to the source since there were no lights on, nothing overhead, truly no noticable source.It looked like it had to come from directly overhead. there was nothing there. a friend came out onto the deck and i pointed out the light. he saw it too and also could not imagine where it was coming from. then there was a huge spark from the center of the circle. we were both astonished- yes, we both saw it- yes we both saw and still see the circle of light. he then went inside to bed. i kept noticing the light on the beach again, i was looking at the waves when i saw a light under the water, very close to the shore. it moved slowly, i watched as it moved south for a few hundred yards then i didn't see it anymore. a few minutes later, the circle of light on the beach was gone. thats it!
my sense/guess is that it could be some sort of probe? since the source of light had to be coming from directly above the circle of light on the beach-there must have been something far above sending the light.I've never heard of an experience like this and was wondering if there are others? maybe this is not a ufo since we didn't see anything flying or even in the sky. it was without a doubt something very otherworldly.
thank you for your response.
content.summary: There was a circle of light on the beach, there was no observable source. while looking at it, there was a big spark, then just the light. then i saw a light moving under the ocean, very close to the shoreline,then it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: my other half and i were returning from one of our jobs and were coming down barringer rd in ilion. we were aprox 3 to 4 miles up the road in the country area coming down into the village of ilion. while driving he looked up and said what the heck is that. i looked up and in a distance this round shaped  object was just sitting in the sky. around the middle of it were white lights and it seemed to have a hazy glow around it which was orange-ish brown. i told him to hurry up and get closer to where this thing was so i could get some good pictures. it was  8 to 10 miles away, but clearly visible from the top of the hill where we were. the object was in front of another hill which was across from the hill we were on. we drove down the hill, but there were trees all along the road blocking our view. we took another road to see if we could see it clearer but we couldn't find it afterwards. he is still trying to come up with a logical explanation but i know this object clearly resembled what my mother and i saw back in 1982
content.summary: The glowing object hovered over the frankfort schuyler area

content.detailedDescription:
i was on a lounge chair in my backyard on the north side of the swimming pool. i was facing east and was in the shade cast by the tall bamboo behind me. although there was no change in the light, i had a random thought that dark thunderclouds might be coming in from the west and looked up at the sky. a few seconds later i saw a silver disk travelling from west to east, in a straight line over my pool. 
     at first glance i thought it was some kid's silver balloon that got loose but quickly realized it was no floppy, tinfoil balloon, but some kind of firm-surfaced metal. i focused in on it so i could remember as much detail as possible.  it was shaped like a disk but also had a squashed egg type shape. the top and bottom were rounded and the sides were slightly rounded, like the shape of a mento candy. there were no hard edges or seams, no puckers or variations of color or texture in the surface. it was totally smooth and reflective, the bottom of it turning darker as it passed over the green trees at the eastern end of the yard. i'm estimating that it was about 30 feet above the fully mature maple trees, so maybe 60 feet above ground. i got the impression that it might be 3 to 4 feet in diameter. although it was breezy at the treetops, the disk moved in a straight line, with no side to side wavering or drifting from the wind, and no change in altitude. there was absolutely no sound emitting from it. 
     after the disk had been in my sight for about 5 seconds i had the presence of mind to call out, "look up!" to my husband, who was doing some yardwork about 20 feet behind me and to the right. since he was to the right of the edge of the bamboo stand he had a clear view of the disk and looked up in time to see it just as it was going over the trees. his description of the disk corroborated mine. from the time i saw the disk to the time it travelled out of sight was about 8 to 10 seconds and i estimate that the distance it travelled in that time was about 50 to 60 feet. using these estimates, the disk was travelling at about 3 to 5 miles per hour. unfortunately there was no time to take a picture, even with my cell phone. 
     immediately following this sighting i felt glad to have finally seen something concrete and real because it left no doubt that these objects do exist. then i started wondering whether the fact that they do exist was a good thing or not. knowing that there is technology far advanced than that held by us here on earth is a bit unsettling. from our own history we know what usually happens when a technologically advanced civilization meets a less advanced society. i can only hope that whoever is controlling these objects has a less aggressive nature than us humans. 
     we told friends about the sighting but, of course, most of them just laughed it off and asked how much we had been drinking at the time (which, by the way, was not at all). we humans do laugh when we are nervous about something, and we don't want to hear about something that makes us uncomfortable.  and the quickest way to shut someone up is to ridicule them. so our friends reactions are normal, but we know what we saw. i don't think our government could keep such technology a secret. even if they could, if we had it, we wouldn't be fighting wars to get oil because we would have a better propulsion system already. so what we saw was an object, that was flying and is unidentified...A ufo.
content.summary: Disc travelled over my backyard in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
I star gaze every night for a short time. last night the sky was so clear and beautiful. i noticed one of the stars move then move back. i thought it was a spasm in my eye. i focused on this star. it did this quick movement three times. from where it was stationary it went west then back to its original spot. the distance it moved was very short.

afterward it moved across the sky a great distance. from where i originally saw it and headed east. it kind of wobbled in its flight path it was weird hard to describe. moved past another dark object in the sky, that had no illumination and continued on. it kind of looked like an eclipse. then it stopped for a few seconds, and then faded away like a shiny object sinking in murky water.

i assumed it could have been a satellite. but i never heard of a satellite change direction so quickly and then disappear. possible asteroid? again not sure. the change in direction is the only thing making me consider intelligent guided craft. of course when i see something like this i don���t have a camera, binoculars, or my telescope handy. i did grab my binoculars afterwards and watched the sky for a further 20 minutes. but only one shooting star from a south to north direction was observed.
content.summary: Medium size star.

content.detailedDescription: It appeared in the south at near the same distance as an airplane might fly past the airport.   it was round at first and it reminded me of a broach made of mother of pearl with a silver border around it. i spotted it first with only my eyeglasses later i used my binoculars  it appeared to stand still for about a minute then it moved very slowly higher in the sky then it appeared to stop then it moved higher and to the west very slowly.  during it's movement to the west it changed shape to more of a cigar shape.  the light also became faintly colorful and appeared to vary the rainbow like colors from left to right.  after several minutes it returned to a round shape.  about a minute later it blinked out and although i continued to look i couldn't find it at all.  i was with my wife and she did not see it at all  but she has limited vision.  at about 5 after 8pm i was able to locate venus in the west and way north of the object i had sighted.  this sighting took place at my home on the front porch.  my wife and i sit in our rocking chairs and enjoy the fresh air and the sunset every evening.  we live near the airport and we enjoy watching the planes come in low as they head for the airport.  i was really wishing for somebody else to spot it as well.  but my neighbors were busy across the street trying to move a shed across the property.  i was not excited at first but after i thought about it i did get excited  my wife didn't appear to share my enthusiasm.  since it was so close to the airport i wonder if they picked it up on their instruments.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was as bright as venus in the south sky.

content.detailedDescription:
While watching some guys home movies of valley of the gods, utah on youtube (he was videotaping his vacation) i noticed something odd in his video (something seemed to dart across the screen, but it was too fast to distinguish--could've been dirt, a bird, or nothing). since i had just watched a show on ufos (ufohunters), i was curious what it was so i slowed down the video. when i did this, to my surprise, i found three consecutive still images (all that occur within 1/10th of a second) of a very strange, unexplained object (see attachments). at first i thought there might be three different objects, but when i slowed the video down, it seemed more like one fast-moving object moving upward, changing direction (and possibly changing shape) all within a fraction of a second.

note: the bright line in the middle of the images is sun glare. i've uploaded the pictures in consecutive order, as they appear in the video.

could someone please explain to me what this is... or what it is not? thanks.
content.summary: Three clear pics of ufo over dugway, ut.
